verbs.description: perorate (third-person singular simple present perorates, present participle perorating, simple past and past participle perorated)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To speak or declaim at great length, especially in a pompous or grandiloquent manner; to harangue.
(intransitive) To make a peroration; to make a formal recapitulation at the end of a speech.
